app_descript:
Qibla Finder Compass 100%

The Qibla Finder Compass 100% is a smart and efficient application designed for Muslims to find the accurate Qibla direction (ŸÇÿ®ŸÑÿ©) for their prayers, utilizing state-of-the-art GPS technology without requiring an internet connection. This low-size app is both user-friendly and reliable, ensuring that users can locate the direction of the Kaaba in Mecca (Makkah) from anywhere in the world.
